channel.title: Demo-rsses on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Demo-rsses on Blog

item.title: Touch Your Toes Routine
item.description:
Years of sitting has caused many of us to have stiff joints and muscles. The sad truth is, most of us can’t even touch our toes when standing up with our knees locked.

Humans are meant to move, and our sedentary lifestyle has tightened our bodies to such a degree that most of us have trouble touching our knees.

The good news is that it’s not the end. It’s possible to regain the mobility you once lost.

I want to share with you how I got my mobility back.

Below is a guide to a routine on how to regain your mobility, one day at a time.

It won’t be easy, and it won’t be fast, but after a few weeks, you will notice a huge improvement.

Maybe this time next year, you can touch your toes!
